thing-type.label: Haas and Sohn Pellet stove Binding Thing
thing-type.description: The binding for haassohnpelletstove communicates with a Haas and Sohn Pelletoven through the optional WLAN-Modul. More information can be found here: https://www.haassohn.com/de/ihr-plus/WLAN-Funktion

parameter.name: hostIP
parameter.label: IP Address
parameter.description: Please add the IP Address of the WIFI Module of the Haas and Sohn oven here

parameter.name: hostPIN
parameter.label: PIN
parameter.description: Please add the PIN of your oven here. You can find it in the Menu directly in your oven.

parameter.name: refreshRate
parameter.label: Refresh Rate
parameter.description: How often the Pellet Stove should schedule a refresh after a channel is linked to an item. Temperature data will be refreshed according this set time in seconds. Valid input is 0 - 999.

channel-type.label: Is temperature of the Stove
channel-type.description: Receives the is temperature as string

channel-type.label: Actual mode of the stove
channel-type.description: Receives the actual mode of the stove as string

channel-type.label: Set temperature for the stove
channel-type.description: Set the target temperature of the stove as number:temperature

channel-type.label: On/Off for the stove
channel-type.description: To turn the stove on/off as switch

channel-type.label: On/Off for the Eco Mode of the stove
channel-type.description: To turn the stove on/off as switch

channel-type.label: Amount of ignition's of the stove
channel-type.description: Receives the total amount of ignition's the stove has as string

channel-type.label: States the next maintenance in kg
channel-type.description: Provides a pellet forecast when the stove need to be maintained next in kilogram as string

channel-type.label: States the next cleaning window in hours
channel-type.description: Provides a time forecast when the stove need to be cleaned next as string

channel-type.label: Total consumption of the stove
channel-type.description: Provides the information about the total consumption of pellets of the stove as string

channel-type.label: Operation hours of the stove
channel-type.description: Provides the information of the operating hours of stove as string
